quienes_somos.txt_parrafo_1: Sober, simple, austere; in a respectful rescue of the past, with clear objectives for the future; with practically a century of existence, today it works with a name that in some way pays homage to the tall and thin native peoples, Huarpes Milcaya, the great conductors of water, who transformed the desert into a garden and who left their traces in Cruz de Piedra.
quienes_somos.txt_parrafo_2: A warm place dedicated entirely to the field of production, to which advanced technology has been incorporated, all in accordance with the sought-after level that allows us to achieve the optimum varietal expression in Premium wines; everything coexists with serenity without any bombast.

lista_equipo.txt_bio_optional: Our team unites technical and human resources for limited batches with the commitment that has always guided us: quality before quantity.

lista_caracteristicas.Varieties: Cabernet Sauvignon, Pinot Noir, Malbec, Moscato Bianco, Moscato Giallo, Ancelotta, Torrontés and Cabernet Franc.

lista_caracteristicas.Harvest transport: Palletized plastic boxes up to 18 kg each.

finca_2.txt_ubicacion_optional: Maipú - Mendoza - Argentina. Cruz de Piedra.
finca_2.txt_descripcion_optional: Vineyard characteristics. Our home in Cruz de Piedra, where the winery produces its wines with advanced technology in a setting of serenity and tradition.

lista_caracteristicas.Harvest transport: Palletized plastic boxes up to 18 kg each.
